accordionData.title: HTML
accordionData.description: Hypertext Markup Language is the standard markup language for documents designed to be displayed in a web browser. It defines the content and structure of web content.

accordionData.title: CSS
accordionData.description: Cascading Style Sheets is a style sheet language used for specifying the presentation and styling of a document written in a markup language such as HTML or XML

accordionData.title: JavaScript
accordionData.description: JavaScript (JS) is a versatile scripting language primarily used to add interactivity and dynamic content to websites. It enables websites to respond to user actions, update content without full page reloads, and enhance user experiences. Beyond the web, JavaScript can also be used for server-side development with Node.js and mobile application development.
